com.bjensen.validation

Class PasswdValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bjensen.validation.PasswdValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.validation.Validator

    @Component
public class PasswdValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.validation.Validator
    Validator class used to enforce constraints on a Password object. This class implements the Spring Validator Interface methods as defined per the API.
    Author:
    bjensen

      • isPasswdCase

        public boolean isPasswdCase(java.lang.String passwdString,
                            org.springframework.validation.Errors error)
        Check password value for presence of upper-alpha characters.
        Parameters:
        passwdString - String is the password value being passed for evaluation.
        error - Errors Object to contain data binding and validation errors if any.
        Returns:
        boolean true if passwdString does not contain an uppercase character.

      • isPasswdCharAndInt

        public boolean isPasswdCharAndInt(java.lang.String passwdString,
                                  org.springframework.validation.Errors error)
        Check password value for presence of at least one character and one number.
        Parameters:
        passwdString - String is the password value being passed for evaluation.
        error - Errors Object to contain data binding and validation errors if any.
        Returns:
        boolean true if passwdString contains at least one character and one number.

      • isPasswdContainsSequence

        public boolean isPasswdContainsSequence(java.lang.String passwdString,
                                        org.springframework.validation.Errors error)
        Check password value for presence of repeating sequential characters.
        Parameters:
        passwdString - String is the password value being passed for evaluation.
        error - Errors Object to contain data binding and validation errors if any.
        Returns:
        boolean true if passwdString does not contain a sequence of characters followed by the same sequence.

      • isPasswdLength

        public boolean isPasswdLength(java.lang.String passwdString,
                              org.springframework.validation.Errors error)
        Test length constraints on the password parameter.
        Parameters:
        passwdString - is the password value being passed for length evaluation.
        error - Errors Object to contain data binding and validation errors if any.
        Returns:
        boolean true if passwdString is between 5 and 12 in length.

      • supports

        public boolean supports(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Describes which Objects this Validator can validate against.
        Specified by:
        supports in interface org.springframework.validation.Validator
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class this Validator implementation supports as per the Spring Validator Interface.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean if this Validator can support validation for the provided Class.

        Spring Validator Interface method implementation.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
